name: Adrift (bvisness)
description:
A bullet hell where you can't move. Made for the 2018 #gmtkjam.

Use the arrow keys to rotate your shield. Hold the spacebar to grab enemy bullets, and release to shoot them back.

There's no music because music is hard when you're solo. You will have to provide your own music, unless your name is Mark Brown, in which case you know all too well what your music sounds like.

All assets in the game were made by me, with the exception of the assets listed below:

  • Orbitron Font by Matt McInerney, from https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/orbitron. Licensed under the Open Font License (OFL).
  • Space background generated by http://wwwtyro.github.io/space-3d
  • Shield sound from https://opengameart.org/content/space-ship-shield-sounds. Licensed under CC0 (public domain).
